featured.text: Z: Ari will be a superagent running the same company.

definition.zh_def: 超級代理人；一種具有特別權限或能力的代理人，通常用於商業或政治場合。
definition.en_def: A superagent is an agent with special powers or capabilities, often used in business or political contexts.
definition.example: The superagent negotiated a deal that benefited both parties.
